TopicTitle: How to make code or whatever?

Articles.Content: Hi there, I just wanna make a simple as can be plugin for KSP. No parts whatsoever. Just to show how far you are from the KSC, Kerbin, or anywhere else. Problem is, how do you do it? Any help is appreciated.![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

Or if you => Kerbal => Object don't make a right angle triangle (which is pretty much \*always\*):

**Ã¢Ë†Å¡** (Your distance to Kerbol)^2^ + (Target object's distance to Kerbol)^2^ - 2(Your distance to Kerbol)(Target's distance to Kerbol)\*cos(![44ddf6e825ef5a1ea521e708af7deb73.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/math/4/4/d/44ddf6e825ef5a1ea521e708af7deb73.png))

Where ![44ddf6e825ef5a1ea521e708af7deb73.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/math/4/4/d/44ddf6e825ef5a1ea521e708af7deb73.png) is the angle.

Anyway, to answer OP's question - checkout the wiki's page on creating add-ons:

[http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Plugins](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Plugins)
